name: places/ChIJi3RVzOpYwokRVzaI4bohHQw
formattedAddress: 1435 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1435 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA

editorialSummary.text: Long-running (since 1980) florist offering unique arrangements with fresh, dried & silk flowers.

originalText.text: I have been using Richard Salome for my interior and exterior plantings in Manhattan for the past 15 years. He does all of my terrace flower selections, plantings, clean up, etc. His creativity is second to none and his work is superb and I would recommend him to everyone.

text.text: I have been using Richard Salome for my interior and exterior plantings in Manhattan for the past 15 years. He does all of my terrace flower selections, plantings, clean up, etc. His creativity is second to none and his work is superb and I would recommend him to everyone.

originalText.text: I have been using Richard Salome Flowers for the past 40 years and just wanted to say how helpful, knowledgeable and creative Richie Salome is.  He always helps me personally and creates something different for every occasion.  Whenever I send anything to friends and family from Richard Salome Flowers they always call me and remark how beautiful it is! Their delivery time is excellent too.  I recently moved but I still call Richie Salome when I need a silk creation for my home or need to send flowers to friends and family in NYC and the Tri-state area. Richard Salome Flowers has consistently created beautiful arrangements and plants for me for the past 40 years!  In this changing world its nice to shop where there is experience and quality readily available.

originalText.text:
By far my favorite florist! Great selections, awesome staff, and amazing service! It's my mistake for not reviewing these guys for so long but this is my go-to place for exotic flowers--my wife is Australian and has exotic flowers in her mind from her hometown and they supply them on a regular basis! Great prices for what you're getting.

In a recent shopping adventure, with very LIMITED time, I needed a boutonnière for a black tie wedding, and cool as a cucumber, they delivered with superb results! The owner, Richard and his associate, Lorraine, were extremely helpful and I couldn't thank them enough for their prompt service!! Thank you again! They also specialize in in-home service in and around the city.

I highly recommend this place!

originalText.text:
I would say that Richard Salome’s
Flower arrangements are superior to many other “Top Florist “ I’ve ever used . My affair he did for us was even far more superior at my 40 th birthday party at the Pierre hotel in Manhattan. I have used all the top quality designers in NYC. He stands out above many of his peers

originalText.text: Avoid!! I received three cheap and generic looking arrangements because the store did not have the actual arrangements I ordered.  I called to let them know I was dissappointed.  Instead of offering a solution or apologizing, the store was rude and blamed me for ordering same day delivery (even though their website promotes same day delivery).
